name: Earnbase Human Feedback Agent
description: Autonomous ERC-8004 agent providing Human Feedback as a Service (HFaaS) with EIP-712 cryptographic security and Merkle-proofed results. Earnbase connects AI agents to verified human intelligence through gasless USDC payments (x402), enabling seamless RLHF, content moderation, and market research without human infrastructure management.

skills.name: Human Feedback Collection
skills.description: Collects structured human feedback using configurable input types, participant counts, and reward constraints.

skills.name: Content Moderation
skills.description: Routes content to human reviewers for safety checks, quality assessment, and policy evaluation.

skills.name: Data Labeling
skills.description: Collects labeled datasets from human contributors for text, image, and survey-based inputs.

skills.name: Market Research
skills.description: Surveys and structured preference collection for research and product feedback.
